ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Radio JOVE HNRAO TFD+FSX8S Spectrograph 15-30 MHz Dynamic Spectrograms
ResourceHeader.Description: Dynamic Spectrogram plots from output of the HNRAO Terminated Folded Dipole and FSX8S Spectrograph operating from 15-30 MHz. The plots are generated using the Radio-Sky Spectrograph software. The Display Cadence will vary but 8 hours is a reasonable maximum value for the timespan of a single file. Time is presented in Universal Time (UT).
